translation1: "I won't go, I ordered something online 1 hour ago and no one has contacted me yet, this is definitely an online scam.You think this is my first time ordering takeout? After investigating, you said the same thing! I checked the address several times before placing the order, and it was delivered successfully, thank you! How many days ago was that?"
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Addition: The evaluated text includes 'and it was delivered successfully', which is not mentioned in the reference text.", "Wrong Translation: The reference text says 'You said that after the investigation!', but the evaluated text translates this to 'After investigating, you said the same thing!', which does not convey the same sentiment or information." ]} }
reference: I won’t go. I placed a delivery order. No one contacted me during this one hour, and this is online fraud. You think this is the first time that I have ordered food? You said that after the investigation! I checked the address multiple times before placing the order. Okay, thank you! How many days?

translation1: "Heat dissipation effect: good, thin and light weight: convenient, appearance material: satisfactory, Huawei's performance-to-price ratio has always been high. The new machine is very good. The performance is stable, and there are no problems with the four exhaust ports for heat dissipation. It is worth recommending.This Huawei Mate 30 Pro gaming phone is pretty good, it's practical and reliable, and the brand is trustworthy. As for the price of Huawei Mate 30 Pro, it's not too expensive. Personally, I think the Huawei Mate 30 Pro is really good. The gaming experience is smooth and comfortable, and I can play most games smoothly, including PUBG Mobile at high frame rates, and I can easily win in games like LOL and CSGO. Most 3A games are also playable.Heat dissipation effect: The heat dissipation effect is not bad, the fan is quite powerful, and the work is relatively quiet. The game effect is also quite good when the fan is set to full speed. The appearance is quite cool, and the display effect of the game itself is quite clear. The screen is quite clear, and playing games in 1080p is enough for a laptop user to think it's pretty good. It's mainly used for design work, and the cost-performance ratio is quite high. It's lighter and better-looking than imagined, and the red on the butt is a very nice color of wine, not as vulgar as imagined. Overall, it's much better than expected, and it's worth buying. It's also suitable for women.Two years ago, I started using the MSI Gaming Laptop and have been using it for two years now. The cost-performance ratio is quite high, and the quality is quite sturdy! My friends around me also recommend them to purchase this product! Currently, I have purchased three models in this series of laptops!The appearance is beautiful and good-looking, and the configuration is also very suitable for my nephew to buy. I originally planned to wait for the 418 bank activity, but he needed it urgently, so I had to buy it earlier. As a result, I missed the bank's big activity, which is a bit regretful. However, the cost-performance ratio is quite high, and the logistics is also quite fast. I will come back later to update the review.A brand new game notebook with high cost-performance, designed in a very good style, has already been installed with Windows 11 and Office 2019, and the 3D rendering effect is displayed: bought it for my child to use for 3D rendering, the software is already installed, and my child said it can be used without any problems. This notebook is very suitable for 3D design work. I bought it for my son, and he said it was very good.The computer is pretty good, especially the customer service attitude is very good, they are patient with those who don't understand and are willing to help. It's recommended to purchase, and the graphics for playing games are quite good."
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Wrong Translation: The evaluated text changes the brand and product from Acer shadow knight dragon game laptop to Huawei Mate 30 Pro gaming phone and MSI Gaming Laptop.", "Addition: The evaluated text includes a mention to Windows 11 and Office 2019 which are not mentioned in the reference text.", "Omission: There's no mention of the laptop being lighter, prettier, and of a beautiful wine color in the evaluated text. The text also omits the idea that it exceeded expectations and it's suitable for girls."] } }
reference: Heat dissipation: good; lightness: convenient; appearance and material: satisfactory; Acer has always been cost-effective. The new laptop is very good. The function is stable, and the heat dissipation of the four air outlets has no problem; it is worth recommending. This Acer shadow knight dragon game laptop is pretty good with sufficient materials; it is a brand you can trust! Acer shadow knight dragon is not expensive. Personally, I think Acer shadow knight dragon is really good; game effect: playing games on it feels nice, you can play most games without any problem, and my high frame rate PUBG game was stable and smooth, and LOL was no problem at all; it can also let you play CSgo without any trouble and you can play most Three A games on it. I think it is pretty good; I mainly used it to do design and it is very cost-effective, lighter and prettier than I thought; the red on its rear side is a beautiful wine color, not garish at all; it far exceeded my expectation overall and is worth purchasing, suitable for girls as well. Two years ago, I gained contact with Acer shadow knight, and I think it is cost-effective and has great quality after the two years use. I also recommended my friends to buy this product! I have bought three laptops of this series! It looks beautiful and has good configurations. I bought it for my nephew; I thought I would wait for the 418 bank sale, but he needed it urgently and I just bought it earlier, so it was a pity that I wasn’t able to participate in the big bank sale. But it was cost-effective and shipping was fast; I’ll make a follow-up review after using it for some time. Brand new in original packaging, highly cost-effective game laptop; design style is good and windows 11 and office 2019 have already been installed. Display effect: I bought it for my child to do 3D rendering; the software has been installed and my child said it worked fine; this laptop works OK for 3D design. I bought it for my son, and he said it’s pretty good. The laptop is good; the customer service staff is really nice; just ask them if you have any question; recommended. translation1: "Taking a foot bath and getting an electric shock from the bubbles? Choosing the right foot bath basin can have excellent therapeutic and health effects on the feet. Today, the editor of Jumei will answer this question and hope to help friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, foot bath basins are becoming more and more popular among consumers, and a large number of products with different specifications have emerged in the market, providing consumers with a wide range of choices, from more than 100 yuan to thousands of yuan.In related data, compared with traditional home appliances, sales of health-related home appliances such as foot bath basins are booming, but foot bath basins do not have a dedicated industry standard, so there is a certain safety risk. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told reporters. Recently, he bought a foot bath basin as a birthday gift for his father, but his father felt numbness in his feet when soaking.Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath, but he didn't expect that even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation on the soles of his feet. Mr. Li tried using a pen, and surprisingly, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the foot bath was conducting electricity. Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant's attitude was not bad, even though he returned the foot bath, Mr. Li still felt unhappy.Because he found that this popular foot bath basin has no clear and detailed industry regulations in terms of applicable population, materials guaranteeing safety at the highest temperature setting, etc. However, generally speaking, foot bath basins do not have electrical problems, but it cannot be ruled out that some products may not have been strictly controlled during production. Therefore, when purchasing, choose a modular foot bath basin.Water and electricity are separated, and there is no safety hazard. You can test it with an electric pen at will."
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Wrong Translation: The reference text mentions 'Gome will answer this question,' but in the text to evaluate it's been translated as 'the editor of Jumei will answer this question.'", "Wrong Translation: The reference text quotes Mr. Li as saying 'Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous,' but in the text to evaluate, this quote has been translated as 'It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!'", "Wrong Translation: The reference text mentions Mr. Li using a 'tester' while in the text to evaluate, it's been translated as 'a pen'", "Wrong Translation: The reference text suggests choosing a 'split type' feet bath basin. But the evaluated text suggests choosing a 'modular' foot bath basin.", "Wrong Translation: Instead of 'basin was electrified' as in the reference text, the text to evaluate uses 'basin was conducting electricity'" ]} }
reference: Does it mean there is leakage of electricity if my feet feel numb in the feet bath basin? Choosing the right feet bath basin can provide good pedicure and healthcare, and today Gome will answer this question; hopefully it will be helpful to you. As people care more about healthcare, feet bath basin has become more popular among the customers, and a large batch of products of different levels have emerged on the market, from a little more than 100 yuan up to a thousand yuan, giving the customers a lot of options. According to related statistics, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of healthcare products such as feet bath basin was hot, but there is no specialized industry standard for feet bath basin and so there is potential safety risk. “Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous!” Mr. Li told reporter that he recently bought a feet bath basin for his father as a birthday present, but his father felt that the bottom of his feet were numb when using it. Mr. Li first thought it was caused by the vibration function of the feet bath basin, and it was unexpected that his father still felt his feet were numb after turning off the vibration function. Mr. Li used a tester and the light on it was on; it was to Mr. Li’s surprise that the water in the feet bath basin was electrified. Then he contacted the seller, whose attitude was nice, but Mr. Li still felt upset although he had returned it. Because he found that feet bath basin, which has been popular for a long time, still has no explicit and detailed industry regulations on the setting of the maximum temperature, suitable crowd, what materials are safe to use, etc. But normally feet bath basin shouldn’t be electrified, however we can’t rule out the fact that a few products might not have been strictly checked before leaving the factory. Therefore, choose split type feet bath basin. There is no safety risk when water and electricity are separated. Meanwhile, you can use a tester to test it.

translation1: "More than 130 Asian American organizations in the US submitted a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, accusing three Ivy League schools - Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - of discriminating against Asian American applicants in their admission process. The Asian American Education Alliance, which led the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on the same day. - Xu Jianmei, Xinhua News Agency, Washington, May 23rd.The chairman of the organization, Zhao Yu Kong, said at a press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission requirements of top American universities has increased many times over, but the proportion of Asians in these three top American universities has remained at the same level. Many studies have shown that these universities have systematically and persistently discriminated against Asian applicants in their so-called \"holistic\" admission process. Zhao Yu Kong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three universities, the acceptance rate of Asians was the lowest compared to the number of applicants of all ethnicities.According to data from the US Department of Education, among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian-American students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian-American applicants for more than 20 years. Zhu Yu told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hope to submit a lawsuit and urge the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice to investigate and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian-Americans in recruitment. They also hope that the universities being sued will take the issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian-Americans.Currently, the three colleges that have been complained about have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, at which time it filed a complaint against Harvard University for discrimination in admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept it due to procedural reasons. In addition to American Chinese organizations, this time's appeal also includes Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani American educational organizations."
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Addition: The text to evaluate adds a claim about 'Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian-American applicants' when the reference text mentioned 'implemented racial quota of Asian applicants.' It's a nuanced difference but potentially legally significant.", "Wrong Translation: The group 'Asian American Coalition for Education' is translated as 'Asian American Education Alliance'.", "Addition: The text to evaluate added the use of the term 'lawsuit' when the reference text mentions 'complaint'", "Omission: The text to evaluate has not mentioned the aspect of 'long-term, continous and systematic way' when referring to discrimination against Asian students during the admission process.", "Omission: The text to evaluate does not mention the name 'Saunders' in the context of the 2014 research.", "Omission: The text does not mention the statement that 'the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds' in relation to the complaint against Harvard University." ]} }
reference: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College. Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day. According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level. According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process. As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants. Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years. Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts. They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students. The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet. Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds. In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.

translation1: "\"Your ride-hailing driver's phone number is #PHONENUMBER# and their name is #NAME#. Could you please provide a reasonable explanation?\"Sure, but your driver has some issues. Please handle it well."
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Wrong Translation: 'They have wrapped up' is missing from the evaluated text.", "Omission: 'issue that needs to be dealt with' is missing from the evaluated text.", "Addition: 'Please handle it well' not present in the reference text", "Wrong Translation: 'Your ride-hailing driver' instead of 'your delivery person'."] } }
reference: They have wrapped up. The number and name of your delivery person is #PHONENUMBER# and #NAME#. Please offer me a reasonable solution. Sure, but your delivery person has some issue that needs to be dealt with.

translation1: "According to a recent video conference on the employment and entrepreneurship work for the 2022 graduates of colleges and universities in Beijing co-hosted by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau, the number of 2022 college graduates in the Beijing region is expected to reach 268,000, an increase of 16,000 from last year. A relevant responsible person from the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will deploy the employment work for Beijing college graduates from the aspects of strengthening supply-demand matching, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring assistance for the disadvantaged, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.Journalists learned that the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will set up a practical platform to increase job opportunities and actively contact 40 universities' graduate job experience bases, visit recruitment units, and integrate demand and job information. They will focus on implementing the \"Six Ones\" plan, which includes expanding the recruitment of units, expanding the recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expanding the recruitment of basic-level projects, expanding the recruitment of those who apply for military service, expanding the recruitment of internships and job-hopping, and expanding the recruitment of entrepreneurship-driven employment. They will also implement \"lifelong planning\" dynamic management, recommending no fewer than 5 job information for each graduate, and ensuring that graduates with employment difficulties from difficult families achieve 100% support."
gpt_response: { "Accuracy": { "Mistakes": [ "Omission: The original text mentions 'expand the batch of employment probation retention', which isn't exactly mentioned in the evaluated text. Instead, the evaluated text mentions 'expanding the recruitment of internships and job-hopping', which is a new information not present in the reference.", "Omission: The evaluated text omits the source of the report, 'Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na)'.", "Omission: The original text mentions that 'the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand...', This sentence is in the evaluated text, however, it is attributed to a 'relevant responsible person' while the reference text does not mention who stated this.", "Addition: The evaluated text introduces the idea of a \"lifelong planning\" dynamic management', this concept is not mentioned in the reference text", "Addition: The evaluated text uses the term 'the \"Six Ones\" plan', this term is not used in the reference text. In the reference text the term used is 'six batches'.", "Addition: The evaluated text mentions 'the recruitment of internships and job-hopping', this idea is not presented in the reference text."] } }
reference: The number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022 - Xinhua News Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na) Reporter learned from the 2022 Beijing University and College Graduates’ Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference jointly held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security that the number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, increased by 16,000 compared with last year. Responsible person from Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security introduced that the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring to provide assistance for those with difficulties, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency. Reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security will establish a platform to increase work position supply, take the initiative to contact 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employing unit, and integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", that is, expand the batch of recruitment of institutions, expand the batch of recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the batch of recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the batch of recruitment of military recruits, expand the batch of employment probation retention, and expand the batch of entrepreneurship to promote employment; implement the dynamic management of "one policy for one student", recommend no less than 5 jobs for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates from poor families with the willingness to work will be assisted.
